info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:07PM CDT by NWS North Platte NE
info.description:
At 806 PM CDT/706 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kilgore to 20 miles southeast of Medicine Lake to 6 miles northeast of Ashby. Movement was east at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects.
Locations impacted include... Valentine, Cody, Kilgore, Nenzel, Merritt Reservoir, Crookston, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Speckel Meir Lake, Steer Creek Campground, Schoolhouse Lake, Mother Lake, Marsh Flat, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Hire, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek, Sevenmile Hill, and Big Alkali Lake State Wildlife Management Area.
This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 160 and 200. Highway 61 between mile markers 166 and 177. Highway 97 between mile markers 73 and 141. Highway 83 near mile marker 205, and between mile markers 213 and 222. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 4, and between mile markers 6 and 7.
info.instruction:
If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/ for the Panhandle of, north central and west central Nebraska.

parameter.value: STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CHERRY...NORTHEASTERN GRANT...NORTHERN HOOKER AND SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/

area.areaDesc: Sheridan; Eastern Cherry; Grant; Hooker; Western Cherry
